thread.section_title: Hotel de Seze - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Paris holiday
thread.title_full: Paris holiday - Review of Hotel de Seze, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Ibaron
title: Paris holiday
text:
Loved staying in De Seze Hotel
Location was amazing and very close to all the top area
The team was super nice and helpful.
The room was very clean , bed was comfortable and bathroom was excellent!
Breakfast was very good .
The hotel offered coffee anytime I wanted during the whole day.
Service was very good and next time I will definitely stay again in this hotel.
I enjoy very much of all what a boutiq hotel has to offer.
I didnt have the opportunity but it has a gym and hamam room as well.
Leo in the front desk was super nice!
I recommend this in high recommendation.
